customQuery.description: Write a SOQL query to find a singular Contact, Account or Case record during registration. See docs for more information on using form values as bind variables. NOTE: You must include the AccountId field when querying Contacts.
customQuery.title: Custom Query

sendEmailConfirmation.title: Send email confirmation?
sendEmailConfirmation.description: Send email confirmation on successful registration of a user. Consider switching off, if using another solution for sending email communications such as Marketing Cloud, or if Welcome Emails are switched on for your site.

registerButtonSignUpMessage.title: Sign Up Button Label
registerButtonSignUpMessage.description: Text used on the submit button

registerButtonWaitingMessage.title: Sign Up Button Waiting Message
registerButtonWaitingMessage.description: Text used after submit button is clicked

portalRegistrationRedirect.title: Redirect URL After Registration
portalRegistrationRedirect.description: Set the URL that the user will be redirected to once they successfully register

passwordMatchError.title: Password Match Error
passwordMatchError.description: Error message shown if passwords do not match

usernameTakenMessage.title: Username Taken Error
usernameTakenMessage.description: Error message shown if the chosen username is already taken

noRecordFoundError.title: Record Not Found Error
noRecordFoundError.description: Error message shown if the SOQL query doesn't find any results. Shown to the user.

multipleRecordsFoundError.title: Multiple Records Found Error
multipleRecordsFoundError.description: Error message shown if the SOQL query finds more than one result. Shown to the user.

errorOnCreate.title: Record Create Error
errorOnCreate.description: Error message shown if a failure occurs creating a new record during registration. Shown to the user.

portalLoginError.title: Login after Registration Error
portalLoginError.description: Error message shown if a failure occurs logging into the portal after registration. Shown to the user.

portalRegistrationError.title: User Creation Error
portalRegistrationError.description: Error message shown if a failure occurs during registration when creating a new user. Shown to the user.

portalRegistrationUserExists.title: Already Registered Error
portalRegistrationUserExists.description: Error message shown if the matched contact is already a portal user. Shown to the user.

enablePasswordlessLogin.title: Enable Passwordless Login
enablePasswordlessLogin.description: Enable passwordless login for the site. NOTE: Requires other configuration for this to work, see the documentation for full setup instructions.

registerButtonAwaitingCodeMessage.title: Submit Verification Button Label
registerButtonAwaitingCodeMessage.description: Text used for the Submit Verification Code button.

portalErrorSendVerificationCode.title: Verification Code Send Error
portalErrorSendVerificationCode.description: Error message shown if there is a problem sending a verification code to the user based on the method chosen.

failedCodeVerificationMessage.title: Verification Code Validation Error
failedCodeVerificationMessage.description: Error message shown if there is a problem verifying the specified verification code entered by the user.

createNotFound.title: Create Record on Registration (if not found)?
createNotFound.description: Create a Contact record of the specified type, if a record is not found when registering.

accountId.title: Account Id
accountId.description: If creating a Contact, set the Account Id that the Contact will be related to. If using Person Accounts, leave this field blank.
